name: $barcode
desc: An RFID chip reader captured the data from the device label

name: $rfid
desc: The data was read from the label by a person and manually entered. (e.g.  via a keyboard)

name: $manual
desc: The data originated from a patient's implant card and read by an operator.

name: $card
desc: The data originated from a patient source and not directly scanned or read from a label or card.

name: $self-reported
desc: The method of data capture has not been determined
